trans-unit.source: Represents a control that can be dragged by the user.
trans-unit.target: 表示可以由用户拖动的控件。

trans-unit.source: The Thumb control can be included in another control, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control, to let the user change the control's value.
trans-unit.target: Thumb 控件可以包含在另一个控件，如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>控制，用于以使用户能够更改控件的值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: The Thumb can also be used to resize controls.
trans-unit.target: 滚动块还可用来调整控件的大小。

trans-unit.source: For example, a Thumb control in the corner of a window can provide a location for the user to click with the mouse to start a resize operation.
trans-unit.target: 例如，窗口的角 Thumb 控件可以提供用户使用鼠标即可执行大小调整操作单击的位置。

trans-unit.source: Thumb provides <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> events to manage drag operations associated with the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: Thumb 提供<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted>，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta>事件来管理拖动鼠标指针与关联的操作。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted>

trans-unit.source: When the user presses the left mouse button, the Thumb control receives logical focus and mouse capture, and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 当用户按下鼠标左键时，Thumb 控件接收逻辑焦点和鼠标捕获和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted>

trans-unit.source: While the Thumb control has focus and mouse capture, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> event can be raised multiple times without limit.
trans-unit.target: Thumb 控件具有焦点和鼠标捕获，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta>事件可以无限制引发多次。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta>

trans-unit.source: When the user releases the left mouse button, the Thumb control loses mouse capture and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 当用户释放鼠标左键时，Thumb 控件失去鼠标捕获和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The event information provides a change in position, but does not reposition the Thumb.
trans-unit.target: 事件信息提供在位置的更改，但不会重新滚动块。

trans-unit.source: You must manually change or reposition the Thumb or any other elements that you want to resize or change as a result of the drag operation.
trans-unit.target: 你必须手动更改或重新定位滚动块或你想要调整大小或更改作为拖动操作结果的任何其他元素。

trans-unit.source: The Thumb control does not provide drag-and-drop functionality.
trans-unit.target: Thumb 控件不提供拖放功能。

trans-unit.source: A Thumb control can receive mouse capture, but cannot receive keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Thumb 控件可以接收鼠标捕获，但不能接收键盘焦点。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A> property that corresponds to keyboard focus is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A>对应于键盘焦点的属性设置为`false`。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A>

trans-unit.source: This value overrides the parent class <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> that sets this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此值将覆盖父类<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>，将此属性设置为`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>

trans-unit.source: To provide drag capability, class handling is provided for the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>, <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> and <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseMove> events.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供拖动功能，提供类处理为<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>，<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>和<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseMove>事件。</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseMove> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseMove%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseMove%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseMove%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a Thumb is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control that scrolls content in a viewable area, or viewport, the size of the Thumb reflects the size of the viewport.
trans-unit.target: 当一个法则是属于<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>可视区域或视区的滚动块的大小中的内容滚动的控件反映视区的大小。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>类。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control that is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>是的一部分的控件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>

trans-unit.source: ![Scrollbar illustration](~/add/media/scrollbar-illustration.JPG "Scrollbar illustration") ## Customizing the Thumb Control To apply the same property settings to multiple Thumb controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ![Scrollbar 图](~/add/media/scrollbar-illustration.JPG "Scrollbar 图")# # Thumb 控件到自定义适用于多个 Thumb 控件，使用的相同的属性设置<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 你可以修改默认<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>提供独特外观的控制。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the Thumb, see [Thumb Syles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的部件和特定于滚动块的状态，请参阅[Thumb Syles 和模板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in Button control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 设置 visual 属性仅会产生作用如果该属性既存在按钮控件的默认模板中，通过设置。

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: 可以在的"更改 Visual 结构的控件"一节中找到的可视属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Cancels a drag operation for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取消的拖动操作<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> has mouse capture and logical focus, this method removes mouse capture and raises a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>具有鼠标捕获和逻辑焦点时，此方法删除鼠标捕获，并引发<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control loses mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>控件失去鼠标捕获。

trans-unit.source: This DragCompleted event occurs when the left mouse button is released or when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.CancelDrag%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 在释放鼠标左键时或当此 DragCompleted 事件发生<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.CancelDrag%2A>调用方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.CancelDrag%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control receives mouse capture when the user presses the left mouse button while pausing the mouse pointer over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>控件接收到鼠标捕获，当用户在鼠标指针暂停时按鼠标左键<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: The position of the mouse when the DragCompleted event occurs is provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragDeltaEventArgs> of the last <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> event.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标 DragCompleted 事件发生时的位置由<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragDeltaEventArgs>的最后一个<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragDeltaEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Routing strategy|Bubbling| |Delegate||
trans-unit.target: # # 路由事件信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |路由策略 |冒泡 | |委托 ||

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs one or more times as the mouse changes position when a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control has logical focus and mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: 当鼠标将发生变化时出现一个或多个次<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>控件具有逻辑焦点和鼠标捕获。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control receives focus and mouse capture when the user presses the left mouse button while pausing the mouse pointer over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>控件接收到焦点和鼠标捕获，当用户在鼠标指针暂停时按鼠标左键<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control loses mouse capture when the user releases the left mouse button, or when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.CancelDrag%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>控件失去鼠标捕获，或当用户释放鼠标左键时<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.CancelDrag%2A>调用方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.CancelDrag%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: A new DragDelta event occurs each time the mouse position moves on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 新的 DragDelta 事件发生在屏幕移动鼠标指针位置的每个时间。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, this event can be raised multiple times without a limit when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control has mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: 因此，引发此事件可以是多个时间无限制时<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>控件具有鼠标捕获。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Routing strategy|Bubbling| |Delegate||
trans-unit.target: # # 路由事件信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |路由策略 |冒泡 | |委托 ||

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 标识<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control receives logical focus and mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>控件接收到逻辑焦点和鼠标捕获。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control receives focus and mouse capture when the user presses the left mouse button while pausing the mouse pointer over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>在控件接收焦点和鼠标捕获当用户按下鼠标左键时<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>通过将鼠标指针暂停</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Routing strategy|Bubbling| |Delegate||
trans-unit.target: # # 路由事件信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |路由策略 |冒泡 | |委托 ||

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control has logical focus and mouse capture and the left mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 获取是否<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>控件具有逻辑焦点和捕获鼠标并按下鼠标左键。

trans-unit.source: When the IsDragging property changes its value, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnDraggingChanged%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 在 IsDragging 属性更改其值，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnDraggingChanged%2A>调用方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnDraggingChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework version 3.0 Service Pack 1, IsDragging has a protected setter.
trans-unit.target: 从.NET Framework 版本 3.0 Service Pack 1，IsDragging 具有的受保护的资源库。

trans-unit.source: To use this functionality, your application should target the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此功能，你的应用程序应面向.NET Framework 版本 3.5。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[版本和依赖关系](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control has focus and mouse capture; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>控件具有焦点和鼠标捕获; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>为<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ThumbAutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ThumbAutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control.

trans-unit.source: Responds to a change in the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging*> property.
trans-unit.target: 响应中的值的更改<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging*>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供类处理<xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event by setting <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此实现处理<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>事件通过设置<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>到`true`。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>

trans-unit.source: Also, this method gives the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> logical focus and mouse capture, and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此外，此方法提供<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>逻辑焦点和鼠标捕获和集<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: This implementation also raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted> event.
trans-unit.target: 此实现还引发<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供类处理<xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event by setting <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此实现处理<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>事件通过设置<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>到`true`。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>

trans-unit.source: Also, this method removes mouse capture from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此外，此方法可以删除从鼠标捕获<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>，并将设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging%2A>属性`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: This implementation also raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: 此实现还引发<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供类处理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> has logical focus and mouse capture, this implementation raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> event when the mouse moves.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>具有逻辑焦点和鼠标捕获，此实现将引发<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta>当鼠标移动事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> event is handled by setting <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 在此方案中，<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>通过设置处理事件<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>到`true`。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件数据。
